artist: Painter: After David Teniers, the Younger; Designer: L. Beaudouin; Engraver: Jean Baptiste Pattas
description: interior of an inn; man and woman seated at table right foreground; woman smoking a pipe; fire left background with other peasants; broom left foreground leaning against a bench
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: Peint par David Teniers  Dessiné par Beaudoin  gravé par Patas / LA FUMEUSE / De la Galerie de S.A.S. Monseigneur le Duc d\'Orleans /  A.P.D.R. / ECOLE FLAMANDE | on sheet in pencil: 2-459 ( sheet trimmed and remaining original inscription lost)
title: La Fumeuse
